name: Parachute Panic!
description:
Requires controllers and 2 to 4 players

Parachute Panic pits you against up to 3 friends in a fight to the death for one parachute.

Fall through randomly generated environments and battle for control of the parachute backpack!

Key Features
  • Ragdoll physics and wonky character controls.
  • Hats.
  • Players can have up to 7 nipples.
  • Over 15 weapons.
  • Randomly generated environments.
Controls
  • Move with Left Stick + Right Stick.
    • Arms follow stick positions.
  • Grab with LB (left hand) or RB (right hand).
  • Kick with B.
  • Join with A.
Credits
  • Jensen Verlaan - Character Art
  • Kevan Chambers - Environment Art
  • Robert Orange - Particles and Art
  • John Wei - Weapon Art
  • Sebastian Scaini - Code
  • Lunella - Music
